inclusion.criterion: Patient has given written informed consent before registration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female patients; eligible for primary ALND or sentinel lymph node procedure with frozen section and either: newly diagnosed or recurrent breast cancer in the conserved breast, chest wall or axilla
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with histo- or cytology proven breast cancer UICC/AJCC stage I-III
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fluency in either German, French, Italian, Spanish, Turkish or English
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The EQ-5D questionnaire has been completed at registration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with child-bearing potential, willing to use effective contraception, not currently pregnant and agreeing not to become pregnant after trial registration and during the 24 weeks after surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ALND indicated according to clinical standards, either as single procedure or in combination with breast conserving surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known hypersensitivity for TachoSil® or fibrin sealant
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with mastectomy (simultaneously or within 1 month before registration); patients undergoing completion mastectomy at a later day will remain eligible and are evaluable for analysis according to intention to treat. If the axillary drain is still in place at the time of completion mastectomy and a separate drain is inserted underneath the skin flaps, only the axillary drain will be considered
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior axillary dissection (except prior sentinel node procedure)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Psychiatric disorder precluding understanding of information on trial related topics, giving informed consent, filling out QoL forms
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent treatment with other experimental drugs or treatment in a clinical trial within 30 days prior to trial entry
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with infiltrating ductal breast carcinoma, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative. Lumpectomy was done with clear margins. Axillary sampling revealed 1 positive lymph node out of 12 sampled.
